website_summaries.verdict: A feature-rich 2-piece BP monitor. Bluetooth compatibility allows tracking/emailing results to doctor. Comes at a reasonable price for a top-of-the-line device.
pros: Takes 3 readings at 1-minute intervals and averages them
Great visual indicators, including multicolor lights
cons: Expensive, but you are paying for performance, accuracy, and features that are unmatched by any other product

customer_reviews.title: Worthless because of a small piece of plastic
customer_reviews.text: I'm a physician. I used this Omrom BP cuff exactly 5 times in the three weeks I had it, then the small piece of plastic connecting the tubing to the machine BROKE. Omrom Support offered to SELL me a completely new cuff and tubing - to arrive in 3 months. This breakage is completely unacceptable for any medical product that should last for multiple uses a day for many years. Omrom's support was also unacceptable; not only did they not stand behind their product, they imposed a completely absurd delay in remedying a product fault.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl from San Diego

customer_reviews.title: The ac adapter isn't included in the box
customer_reviews.text: The only problem is that the product was sent WITHOUT the ac adapter. The adapter is part of the product purchased, listed on the containing box itself...but missing nonetheless. I don't have any issues with the product or purchase; however, I have not even used the product in the event of a necessary return.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Davis

customer_reviews.title: Not at all accurate
customer_reviews.text: A healthcare provider measured my and my spouse's blood pressure several times with both the Omron 10 Series Wireless Upper Arm Blood Pressure Monitor as well as with a classic manual sphygmomanometer and stethoscope all with the same arm in the same position each time. The results were that the systolic blood pressures were consistently 10-15 points lower with the Omron 10 Series Wireless Upper Arm Blood Pressure Monitor and the diastolic blood pressures were consistently 5-15 points lower with the Omron 10 Series Wireless Upper Arm Blood Pressure Monitor.
customer_reviews.author: ponygirl

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate
customer_reviews.text: Doctor recommended this brand. She said when I got the device to bring it to her office and they would compare the reading with the reading they got with their medical equipment.Device is easy to use and easy to read but the BP taken with the device was way higher that the BP taken at my doctors office at the same time. Sending it back!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: I'm a nurse and have used this exactly as instructed and it consistently gives false readings. I've compared to our BP monitors at work as well as manual BP and it reads significantly higher than the actual blood pressures. IE: actual reading is 117/70 and this thing will read 140/95 so not just a couple points off. So be very mindful if you are using this to monitor BP and medication dosages. You could be over medicating. This could very well just be my machine, I'm not sure but I would definitely take it with you to your PCP appointments and have them do both readings and make sure you are getting accurate readings.
customer_reviews.author: timothy p.

customer_reviews.title: poor accuracy
customer_reviews.text: This cuff is significantly different from manual reading. compared at Doctor office and home both husband and I are Nurses.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Dorn

customer_reviews.title: Works great and blue tooth sync worked well with included power chord
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Bluetooth sync with iPhone connected as expected however with the included power chord. The battery operating transfers to iphone works fine. I love the three measurements you can set to take with 15,30,60 sec incremental. I recommend this device.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth is useless.
customer_reviews.text: As a BP monitor it appears to be ok.But if you plan to use the bluetooth features please read the app reviews in google store. The Bluetooth features are useless. App should have 0 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This item is inferior
customer_reviews.text: Received this and it was prepacked in an old towel and obviously had been returned. I cannot believe that this was shipped to me. At this time I cannot return it due to the Virus situation so I would like a total refund.
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: is not accurate
customer_reviews.text: The features are nice, the accuracy is not. The machine measures my systolic BP 29 to 40 points higher than other machines while diastolic is higher by 5 to 30 points. To late for me to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Oldman

customer_reviews.title: It’s not accurate.
customer_reviews.text: This would be a good product if it were accurate. I bought it while in quarantine and began charting my blood pressure, which seemed surprisingly high. My doctor was concerned, so I went in to her office yesterday and took the monitor with me so that we could compare the numbers with her monitor. It was VERY off. The doctors showed 118/88 while the Omron read 150/95. My doctor said she was surprised because Omron is usually very good, but this was is not accurate. Thinking your BP is really high is not good for your BP! In fairness, it is easy to use and the display screen is great. But still— I suggest you keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Janie Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. I had for a week and then it keeps giving me errors. About five days after I received this it will no longer sync with my phone. I am having to get daily bp readings for my medical provider and this machine is making it impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Ainsworth

customer_reviews.title: I was shipped a defective device in a box that had been previously opened.
customer_reviews.text: The box appeared to have been opened and resealed, the case was scratched, and the AC power supply was missing. The button used to obtain bluetooth coupling was nonfunctional, and thus, many of the features were nonfunctional. It was probably a defective device that had been returned and reshipped without repair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for blood pressure - wireless connection is frustrating
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use - put cuff around upper arm and push button - blood pressure & pulse in seconds. Captures reading history in unit. Have also loaded the iOS app and connect using Bluetooth. Very frustrated with ability to connect and transfer data. Usually have to play around to get the data to transfer. Tried many connection/transfer sequenced but not found the process that works the same every time. 😡
customer_reviews.author: Michael W Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Replaced older version 3 years old
customer_reviews.text: We replaced an Omron that was 3 years old when we started noticing that if you take BP just a few seconds apart, the reading was quite different. This one seems to be pretty much the same (looks similar but updated), and is more consistent. NOTE: we put batteries in but always use plug.... we suspect that as batteries wear down, the reading is less reliable.
customer_reviews.author: MGW

customer_reviews.title: Excellent BP device
customer_reviews.text: The best things about this device are the pre-formed arm cuff and loading the info on the OMRON app. Runs on battery or AC with plug included. You don’t need to buy the AC plug offered in “usually bought together”. There is no case, so the optional case would be good to have. The screen is easy to read. I had a little trouble with Bluetooth to phone, but keep trying to load data and it will load the data even if it says not connected, eventually. If it doesn’t, it is super easy to input it manually.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Ehrnst

customer_reviews.title: nice app on smart phone
customer_reviews.text: My cardiologist recommended this product. I use the TrueRead settings and I like that it pairs with my phone and then can send the readings via CSV. It feels like a professional product. I rated it 4 out of 5 stars because the pairing could be a bit easier, but after several days I figured it out. I recommend this to anyone who needs to monitor their BP. it also has settings for 2 people.
customer_reviews.author: socal4me

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and pretty accurate
customer_reviews.text: So far, this blood pressure monitor has given some pretty accurate readings if you follow the instructions on how to use the cuff. A couple of times I didn't have it properly positioned on my arm and it did give an inaccurate reading. But if you follow the instructions, there's no reason to receive bad readings. The bluetooth function to sync data to your phone has worked flawlessly and the batteries even last for quite a while. My wife and I both use the monitor to check our blood pressure with the two user settings and sync data to our phones, so I would definitely recommend this monitor and say this is one of Omron's beat monitors so far.
customer_reviews.author: ATLGhostRider

customer_reviews.title: Found hair inside machine
customer_reviews.text: I received a used machine. I found a piece of hair inside the reading machine. Also, everything inside was packed wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Completely Inaccurate Device
customer_reviews.text: I am sorry, but this thing is a piece of JUNK! I have been trying to work with the manufacturer since we received the device. Nothing works. Now the device is indicating that it is detecing an irregular heartbeat. This is happening on 3 out of 5 readings. This is also happening with my wife. Well, it has become so scary that I called my doctor who had me in immediately for an EKG. Guess what... no problems. He also arranged to take my blood pressure and compare it to the Omron unit. Well, guess what... the Omron unit failed an accuracy test for blood pressure as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tina B

customer_reviews.title: Pairing with phone was futile
customer_reviews.text: Really nice blood pressure monitor, but pairing with my iPhone was futile. I own an Omron 7 series and it pairs just fine. The online video I watched was no help as it does not cover the new BP7450 horizontal model. The manual instructions are vague. After three days, I returned it. I will just keep using my older 7 series.
customer_reviews.author: mcw

customer_reviews.title: Great BP monitor.
customer_reviews.text: The devices works well. It’s a little cumbersome getting the info to wirelessly sync from the device to my phone. I have to have it turn off to then hold the BT button to then get it to show the squares and then go in the app and click sync. However that’s my only complaint. I like that it can run entirely off battery or the AC adapter. The time and date set automatically when paired to my phone so I don’t need to set it manually. The app can also be integrated into apples health app so record keeping is easy.
customer_reviews.author: SeanO

customer_reviews.title: It behaves a bit strangely
customer_reviews.text: It is supposed to use Bluetooth to transmit readings from the device to my smart phone. There is a smartphone app from the company, readily downloadable, designed to make that happen. What has repeatedly happened to me, however, is that, after I take my blood pressure, open the app, press the link on the app and wait, it tells me that the app cannot find the device, repeatedly, although the two are only a few inches apart, and although the app sometimes already has found the device, and uploaded the results. The problem may well be with the app, not with the device, which, by itself, is remarkably easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Larchmont Resident

customer_reviews.title: It stopped working after just 3 1/2 months.
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working after just 3 1/2 months. This is incredibly disappointing considering this is my second one. Omron needs to address why these monitors stop working for no apparent reason. The charger I purchased to go with it will not charge it and brand new batteries did not work either. I should not have to spend $65+ every few months. I thought Omron was a reliable product.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy E. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Missing AC adapter
customer_reviews.text: Seems well built and accurate. Like many apparently, AC adapter was missing from box. Called Omron support and was told to return the unit to Amazon, really? Then rep said she would double-check, then said they have changed their response. I was told to email customer support with a case number she gave me, and a copy of the invoice. I did, and missing charger arrived 10 days later. Bluetooth does work, but instructions are poor, and won't import readings taken before unit is paired to Smartphone. Also, have to ask it to import, won't do automatically, but minor inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Fairsailing

customer_reviews.title: Won’t pair with my phone.
customer_reviews.text: Like many other reviewers, I can not get the unit to pair with my phone (IPhone XS max). It’s very disappointing to pay extra for the convenience of not having to manually enter the data and have it not work. It’s just Bluetooth... The blood pressure readings seem fairly accurate.
customer_reviews.author: BT1962

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistant
customer_reviews.text: I only worked on my left wrist & half the time gave me a error code.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth synching proble
customer_reviews.text: Nice product but many synching problems. The explanation of how to synch the first time could be clearer. Picture should clearly show the location of the Bluetooth button and tell you to press the button while in stop mode. In addition, the device would not synch with my iPhone and transfer data subsequently even though the Bluetooth was clearly connected. Don’t spend $80 on this.
customer_reviews.author: Dpperry

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and much better than my previous one
customer_reviews.text: A little tricky to regularly update the mobile app via bluetooth but the device itself is nice. I wanted a wireless one to integrate with Apple Health (to feed my other health apps). It worked but it is not a realtime update. you have to sync after you take the test. I returned this one to purchase the higher-end BP + EKG monitor from this vendor, so clearly i'm satisfied with the product quality. If you don't want/need EKG get this lower cost unit. Much better than the other brands I tested in local pharmacies and stores.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth no bueno
customer_reviews.text: This is great, except the Bluetooth won’t connect. Ever. The “Platinum” unit, is the better choice even though it’s essentially identical. That one connected with ease and is otherwise the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: M&ROlsen

customer_reviews.title: It is not accurate
customer_reviews.text: This steadily clocks my bp as at least 10 below, if not more, than what the old one does. I have taken manually also, it is never in agreement with this machine. I am really disappointed and feel like omron totally screwed up on this one. It was a total waste of money and it is really sad when accurate blood pressure is really important, especially if you have heart problems or kidney issues. I would suggest bypassing this unit entirely. On the bluetooth I haven't even tried it because it serves no purpose if it is not accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie A Candler

customer_reviews.title: Quandary
customer_reviews.text: Product works fine. The armband (the upper arm) with the airtube valve is so stiff and difficult to put on. My biggest beef is that in buying this in the US and shipping to me in the Philippines, I can only connect to the manufacturer's Asian region and the Asian region will not allow me to connect to the monitors bluetooth. So I cannot connect between my phone to monitor to store my bp readings. The prohibition has eliminated a very important aspect of the unit - store readings in an external device.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Locsin

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine. I have never had issues with my blood pressure until recently. I bought another machine and it was terrible. This machine is easy to use, is easy to read and keeps my old numbers so I can go through it to let my doctor know what it has been. Love it. It also lets me know when I have an irregular heartbeat. That helps to let my doctor know how often I have that. Could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Prichard

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate!
customer_reviews.text: Inaccurate! Cuff pinches upper arm. Showed my bp very high!! Very disappointed. Sometimes has error message and wont sync up bluetooth. Got more accurate results with a wrist cuff monitor for half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Omron Series 10 BP monitor
customer_reviews.text: I have bought many Omron BP monitors in 20 yrs. They are a very good choice. Off by maybe 5 to 10 either too low or too high. But this new monitor reads my BP when it wants to. I get an E5 error more times than I get a reading. I plug it up instead of using batteries an it does the same thing. Error E5. I had an ischemic stroke in August and I ordered this in confidence and it has not been a good experience. Omron also makes you pay to send your monitor to them. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: A comfortable unit to use each day for your health!
customer_reviews.text: My older Omron hurt my arm with the pressure, but this unit is wonderful, I highly recommend it! Lets you go to person #2 for a family member to use. Keeps track of days data in memory very nicely. This alerts you to high bp , and actually to heart irrythmia as well.
customer_reviews.author: chris heato

customer_reviews.title: Shipped without the monitor
customer_reviews.text: The product we received had the blood pressure cuff and cord, but NO MONITOR. You can't take your BP without a monitor....
customer_reviews.author: Christine DeYoung

customer_reviews.title: Using it hit or miss
customer_reviews.text: Too many times when using machine you get error message E1 (cuff not on properly). With out changing anything, including change to cuff, but just pressing stop and then start (same button) the machine would work. Omron did not reply when I wrote to them for explanation. Running test consensually results vary widely for no reason. Again no response for Omron. Suggest you purchase another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Grandpa J.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I can't say positively that this is an accurate machine. I haven't done any comparisons. But the readings I see seem to fit with how I feel with my blood pressure. The cuff is easy to put on by yourself and the machine itself is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: D. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: AC powered, very powerful and accurate
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Blood Pressure Monitor I have bought. I prefer this model over others mainly because it is powered by an AC adapter (included) or battery, while most of the others are battery only. This unit is powerful and upper arm is always more accurate than wrist. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: This is garbage
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working in 3 months and I threw $82 or so away. Please buy from pharmacies which one worked for me 15 years or so
customer_reviews.author: esmaeil emami

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working After A Few Weeks
customer_reviews.text: This brand was recommended by my doctor. I read the reviews before buying and most people seemed to be pleased with it. The instructions aren't exactly clear about bypassing the date/time setup each day. The cuff isn't entirely loose. A portion of it is stiff and formed in a circle so you have to pry it apart to place it on your arm and because it fits tightly, it's difficult to position correctly. Nevertheless, it worked fine for a few weeks and then all of a sudden I started getting error messages. I followed all the instructions perfectly but it wouldn't work. I'm returning it.
customer_reviews.author: LadiDi

customer_reviews.title: Blood Pressure Average x three
customer_reviews.text: My doctor recommended a blood pressure machine that will take my pressure 3x, then report the average of the three. This machine took longer to master than our previous Omron but a call to the company helped me to buy the correct machine and then to understand the directions. Both my husband and Iuse the machine so that becomes tricky but we're both pleased with this machine now that we've mastered how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbe P

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Use
customer_reviews.text: This model was very easy to use and read. Did not give five stars as the box it arrived in was not sealed properly at all and looked as though it could have been opened. Not sure. Also left on porch and box was a bit wet although it was under a bit of an overhang. Just happened to find on porch in the morning so don't know if it been there all night. Other than this the machine itself is well worth it
customer_reviews.author: Nancy K

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don't like about this is the connector going from the cuff into the machine can be touchy. If it's working and I don't unplug it it continues to work around 90% of the time. If you unplug it after you're done there's a good chance it will error. Other than that it works great. Transfers easily to the Android app by Bluetooth. Accurate against other monitors.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Schomaker

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend because we found out he has high blood pressure. He had to read the instructions on the perfect placement of the arm cuff but the readings seem right, he plans to take it with him to the doctor to see if it is off by any points from the professional one, and it is extremely easy to read. He likes that is shows his previous numbers since sometimes he forgets to write it down.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Walker

customer_reviews.title: Good Blood Pressure Reader for Average Sized Folks
customer_reviews.text: This device does exactly as described however, one down side which proved to make the device not useful for our needs. The cuff is built for average sized arms, if the person using this has very thick or large arms, the cuff does not close very well and therefore the accuracy of the reading is completely useless. And does not seem to be able to purchase an extra large cuff for those with heavier arms. When trying to use it for those, the cuff tightens so hard it causes pain. Sadly, we had to shelve this device as it could not serve the purpose we needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great device
customer_reviews.text: bought this device to replace my older Omron blood pressure monitor. Device is great and accurate. No complaints or issues here.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Min

customer_reviews.title: THE REAL DEAL
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS REALLY EASY TO USE. I CANNOT SAY THAT THE READINGS ARE 100% PERFECT, BUT THEY COME REALLY CLOSE. I COMPARE MY READINGS WITH MY WIFE. HER BP HAS ALWAYS BEEN LOW AND MINE WAS HIGH UNTIL I STARTED MY BP MEDICATION. I DID NOTICE MINE CAME DOWN AFTER 2 WEEKS OF BP MEDICATION. SO I'M SURE IT'S PRETTY ACCURATE.
customer_reviews.author: swheels

customer_reviews.title: Cumbersome Bluetooth sync with phone
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with the manual method to sync with my phone. I purchased this for the ability to log measurements, but to do this requires a step to turn on Bluetooth on the device. To do the device must be turned off and you use a separate button to sync. My Bluetooth scale is automatically logs data when measuring.
customer_reviews.author: Bubba

customer_reviews.title: Good Accurate Monitor
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I have with this monitor is the cuff. It is difficult to wrap around my arm one handed. Part of the cuff is ridged and makes it hard to hold in one place. I am hoping I will get used to it or find a way to manipulate it better. The readings seem to be accurate and works well otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce McCarty

customer_reviews.title: Easy, smart, accurate
customer_reviews.text: My cardiologist wants me to take my blood pressure twice a day and share the results with him. Bleeah! This device makes it reasonably painless. Put the cuff on. Push the button. Wait 30 seconds. Done. Easy to read, keeps an internal history, AND uploads to its App on my phone which outputs a report I can easily share with my doctor.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Carlson

customer_reviews.title: NOT ACCURATE
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, I was past the return date by the time I could get into my doctor and check this products accuracy. This product 151/90 doctor 124/77. After several attempts by the nurse to calibrate this thing we couldn't get it close to the medical device at the doctors office. Could be just a problem machine but who knows? Reviews were good so If you buy make sure you can get a doctors appointment to check it's accuracy before your 30 day return window closes.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Shipped in its Retail Package and Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Unit was shipped in its retail package with a label slapped on the top. It looked like it had been previously used based on the label and the tape holding the top on. When I opened the package, it looked like it had been repackaged and the display unit was all scratched up. Sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: JWK

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Accurate
customer_reviews.text: This unit couldn't be easier to use - the cuff is the bet I've seen. Unlike other units I have used, you can take you blood pressure multiple times and the readings are very close, if not the same. I would give it five stars except the first unit I received was a previously used unit. Easy to tell it was, and totally unacceptable for a medical supply company. The second one was new and works great.
customer_reviews.author: BerniD

customer_reviews.title: A solid Blood Pressure Monitor - Apple Health Compatible
customer_reviews.text: I recently needed a blood pressure monitor. Omron was a brand recommended by my doctor. This looked nice, big easy to read screen and smartphone connectivity that is Apple Health compatible. It’s very easy to use. Reliably connects to my iPhone and stores all of my history.
customer_reviews.author: zride96

customer_reviews.title: Good BP machine
customer_reviews.text: I like this BP machine. Very easy to put on arm. If you have rather large upper arms, you may want to look at something else. Trouble sometimes when transferring info to my cell. Other that that, works very well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great accuracy but very big and Bluetooth is useless
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, accuracy-wise, wish it didn't have the Bluetooth because, I believe, it contributes to high battery usage and adds ZERO benefit because the app is just so badly coded, slow, full of bugs and asks for permissions I would never provide.
customer_reviews.author: K. O.

customer_reviews.title: The best BP home testing unit on the market
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace an old Omron unit that I had had for about 20 years. This one has everything and is incredibly accurate with many modern features such as bluetooth, etc. This is the BP monitor to purchase if you want accuracy, features and simplicity!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Scott

customer_reviews.title: HIghly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I did a fair amount of research and got recommendations from others before purchasing. Everyone recommend OMRON. I went with this model and I am 100% happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should have one of this at home
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to use, I think everyone should have one of this at home. If you don't use app, it is just one push and done, don't need any setup. if you want to track your blood pressure, simply download the app and sync up with it. It can record for two users, have yet to find out how to record for any extra user. but 2 users is all I need.
customer_reviews.author: Yao C.

customer_reviews.title: Very small  tight cuff
customer_reviews.text: Omron is great, but the cuff on this one is about 2.5 inches diameter, and it does not stretch out over time. Makes it more uncomfortable to get a reading. My mom has small arms, but it's still too tight. They changed the connectors, so we can't even use the old cuff on this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: I tested this against my doctor's blood prsessure equipent, and mine consistently tested more than 20 points too high. If I believed this one, I would check myself into the hospital. It cost a ton, and is useless. No way to recalibrate it. Complete waste of money, and by the time I verified it's inaccuracy, it's return date had expeired. Don't buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Pilgrim

customer_reviews.title: Excellent blood pressure monitor!
customer_reviews.text: Works very well! Love the app sends reminders to check BP! Easily track and share readings with your doctor!
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and phone transfer.
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate and I love that it transfers to my phone with every reading. I just show my doctor and he get the comparison! I had the same brand for over 20 tear! It still works so I passed it to a daughter. I only upgraded to get the phone transfer.
customer_reviews.author: Shirl

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great blood pressure monitor. My only issue is that it doesn't always sync up with the app. I don't really need the app but it would be nice if it works easily and all the time. I would definitely buy this again. Very easy to use, very easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: E. Riddell

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Researched these a lot. I ended up buying this one. Awesome and accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Gartman Reed

customer_reviews.title: Beware how it connects
customer_reviews.text: To use the wireless features, which is half the reason I selected this monitor, you must be willing to post your private medical information to Omron's cloud. By the way they are a huge global company pushing technology and automation. No thanks. While you can use it as a stand alone device, why pay so much for functionality you can't use while maintaining control over your own data?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is great!
customer_reviews.text: We can send the results directly to the doctor. My husband took this with him to the doctor as well, so they could test it's accuracy and it was spot on. So, we highly recommend this. Great options.
customer_reviews.author: Amy M Ralph

customer_reviews.title: Game changer with this blood pressure monitor
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe it was delivered with a few hours of ordering. It is accurate and dont display errors. Amazon you rock
customer_reviews.author: MSJ

customer_reviews.title: Not very accurate
customer_reviews.text: When compared with a manual cuff this one is about 40mm of mercury lower.
customer_reviews.author: Db

customer_reviews.title: Omron : Japanese thy name is precision
customer_reviews.text: Very very user friendly and if you are following the instruction for how to record the numbers , tru read mode gives a very accurate reading, its a must have in every household. The App is not that great, takes multiple attempts to even download, but i just need an accurate machine and i got it.
customer_reviews.author: Sanjeev Kumar Tyagi

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in this one factor
customer_reviews.text: I had this model of blood pressure monitor several years ago and gave it to a family member for their use. I am happy with the unit, EXCEPT, why did they eliminate the carrying case???? It would be so simple and inexpensive to include a basic case to keep the unit, the cuff and adapter in altogether. Disappointed in this one factor
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Loomis

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS FOR A SINGLE USER
customer_reviews.text: If you need one for yourself only, don't get trapped into buying the super expensive one that works for 2 users. I bought this for a friend. Mine has been in use for 5 years and still works great.
customer_reviews.author: Velvet Lady

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put on larger arm
customer_reviews.text: The accuracy is questionable. Checked with my doctor and the OMRON was 5 points higher. They didn’t seem to be bothered, saying within 10 point variance. I wish cuff was flexible, easier to put on and closer to doc measure.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie Hebert

customer_reviews.title: Ok except CUFF WAS PAINFUL WHEN OPERATING so returned it!
customer_reviews.text: I liked it EXCEPT the cuff was very painful when working ... My bicep measures 15” so it should work but I think it was the performed curved cuff that dug into my bicep which made it painful enough that caused me to tense up which can’t be good for taking my blood pressure. RETURNED.
customer_reviews.author: KayAusTX

customer_reviews.title: It’s a pairing nightmare
customer_reviews.text: We tried for hours to get Bluetooth to connect. Finally we gave up. I tried the next day and YOU HAVE TO TURN THE MACHINE COMPLETELY OFF. Really, usually you pair with the machine on. A genius could have programmed the device to be off before you could pair if with the button on the back of the Omron device.
customer_reviews.author: John O. D'Agostino

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and interfaces well with google fit
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, seems consistent, and works with google fit so is all I could want. Omron seems to be a top brand for a reason, I wont hesitate to recommend or buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Good Blood Pressure  Unit
customer_reviews.text: I like that with this unit and the app, you can download and track your readings. I was able to take a screenshot of the measurements and send them to my Cardiologist. Good unit!
customer_reviews.author: aestrada19

customer_reviews.title: AC adapter included
customer_reviews.text: Includes the AC adapter no carrying case ok with it as it’s accurate
customer_reviews.author: Ocatosco

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to transfer data via bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: As mentioned in other reviews, the readings do not transfer easily using blue tooth. I have an android phone and I was only able to pair and transfer the first time I used it. All other times, it was difficult getting it to connect again. Disappointed. Returning this one.
customer_reviews.author: LadyBug6

customer_reviews.title: GREAT unit!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit after using my cheapo for a while. It's so much better! I wish I'd have just bought the good one to start off with. It's worth the peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Brewyet

customer_reviews.title: Best Home Blood Pressure Device
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a number of other blood pressure devices and they all are extremely hard to do without a second person assisting in securing the arm band correctly. This one has support (maybe a medal or plastic strip) to hold your arm firmly as you tighten the cuff with no help from a second person. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Brommer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you need it to connect to your phone.
customer_reviews.text: This BP monitor works well but if you're looking for it to connect to your phone, then don't buy it. You cannot transfer the data from the monitor to your phone. Its so frustrating and it just doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Prinzy

customer_reviews.title: Bad Tech Connect for a Good Machine
customer_reviews.text: The device does it’s job well, but the ability to use with the company app is lacking. Within 24 hours it was no longer syncing. When attempting to re-pair the device to the phone to (hopefully) sync again, I was given an error to keep the app open (by the app) and have the machine within 10 feet...they were 2 inches apart. Seriously lacking in the ability to sync correctly tech wise.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Easy to monitor our BP
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for him to better monitor his BP and it has been a game changer. It was easy to pair with the Omron app in our phone and to stay aware of unexpected BP changes. I recommend this BP monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Marcos

customer_reviews.title: great ... better than my series 3 by a ton
customer_reviews.text: Love that it averages 3 tests and keeps track of results for two people . the blue tooth or other transmission is USELESS ... I can look at it dont need "feature". Tests once a week to check for changes in medications.
customer_reviews.author: papken k chengrian

customer_reviews.title: Way better
customer_reviews.text: Way better and more accurate than a 7-series wrist monitor from the same brand. Mine came with a stiff/hard arm cuff -- not easy to roll it in a small box.
customer_reviews.author: Meow

customer_reviews.title: Very reliable
customer_reviews.text: I actually check my blood pressure 3-4 times a day and once received an abnormal heartbeat. I’d recommend this to everyone. I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: Mz. Dezale

customer_reviews.title: No Success With Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Terrible Bluetooth operation. No success in transferring data from the monitor to an iPhone 11 Plus. Connection was possible but no success transferring data. The manual gives little guidance.
customer_reviews.author: James of California

customer_reviews.title: Very inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, but Systolic readings were consistently off by 20 points or more, Diastolic readings were off by more than 30.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best monitor on the market.
customer_reviews.text: The price of 68.78 easily beats all other sellers. I have Afib and the display shows it. Automatically stores my readings.
customer_reviews.author: John Henry

customer_reviews.title: Omron makes the best BP monitors
customer_reviews.text: I have owned Omron blood pressure monitors for a long time. They are very accurate and have a lot of great features.
customer_reviews.author: jojo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for two users
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I both use this. We love that it has two user settings so we don’t worry about corrupting each other’s averages.
customer_reviews.author: K Gaston

customer_reviews.title: good fit
customer_reviews.text: The biggest issue I've had with past monitors is finding a cuff large enough to go around my arm. All the other cuffs were just too small and a struggle to get a proper fit. Not so with this one. I recommend this one and even bought one for my stepfather and mother. I don't use the bluetooth feature so I can't say anything about it.
customer_reviews.author: Hair Doc2U.

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Upgrade!
customer_reviews.text: Very well built and great upgrade. Shows your last check to the left with new reading. Also bluetooth works again!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Hefner

customer_reviews.title: Second iPhone to Connect
customer_reviews.text: I would give this product five stars IF, and it is a BIG IF, it was able to sync to a second iPhone. Yes, it has two person tracking ability, buy it appears that it only syncs with one iPhone, even if you have two users. RATS!!
customer_reviews.author: JohnG

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to see, preformed cuff a tad hard to get on, but seems to work well. Haven't checked accuracy with doctor yet.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Music

customer_reviews.title: I think this one was used
customer_reviews.text: I sent this back, the cuff was hurting my arm and I think it was used when it was supposed to be new.
customer_reviews.author: SmilingJack

customer_reviews.title: It is very good quality and accuracy I do recommend
customer_reviews.text: I do recommend, its easy to use and in my case the IOS app works just fine to transfer via bluetooh
customer_reviews.author: george coelho silva

product_meta.title: Omron 10 Series Wireless Upper Arm Blood Pressure Monitor
product_meta.description: The Omron 10 Series Wireless monitor can be used with two users for blood pressure readings, and for detecting irregular heartbeats. It will store up to 200 blood pressure readings (100 per user), but when used with the free Omron Connect app, it supports unlimited users and stores unlimited blood pressure readings. Conveniently view your trend graphs and charts, and share as needed with your family, caregivers or doctors. The free Omron Connect app works with iOS and Android devices, as well as Amazon Alexa enabled devices using the Omron Health Skill.
feature_bullets: Features dual LCD backlit screen with extra large digits to display your last reading beside your current reading for comparison; Manage/track 200 total readings for 2 users (100 per user); Easy Wrap ComFit cuff fits arms 9" to 17" in circumference

Includes irregular heartbeat symbol that signals number of irregular heartbeats (up to 3); Hypertension indicator alerts you if your systolic/diastolic measurements are out of normal range; TruRead technology takes 3 readings and calculates averagee
Bluetooth connectivity with the free Omron connect app (on select iOS & Android devices) stores unlimited readings and users; Works with Amazon Alexa enabled devices using the Omron Health skill

Omron is the #1 recommended home blood pressure monitor brand by doctors and pharmacists for clinically accurate home monitoring, and the #1 selling manufacturer of home blood pressure monitors for over 40 years
Note: Blood pressure varies constantly due to many factors including stress, time of day, and how you wrap the cuff, may affect your blood pressure

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
